messages.subject: Re: Samurai war
messages.msgSnippet: ... empire? I ... as Age ... Try Takeda 2-it s a big improvement over part 1. It combines the best of STW and Takeda 1.
messages.messageBody:
--- In samuraihistory@yahoogroups.com, "Totok Sudarijanto" <totoks@...>
wrote:
>
> I apologize in advance if this is not related to samurai history.
>
> Does anyone know any computer-based samurai war game like age of
empire? I
> already have "Takeda" and "Shogun Total War" but none is as exciting
as Age
> of Empire or Age of Mythology.
>

Try Takeda 2-it's a big improvement over part 1. It combines the best
of STW and Takeda 1.

messages.subject: Samurai war
messages.msgSnippet: I apologize in advance if this is not related to samurai history. Does anyone know any computer-based samurai war game like age of empire? I already have
messages.messageBody:
I apologize in advance if this is not related to samurai history.

Does anyone know any computer-based samurai war game like age of empire? I
already have "Takeda" and "Shogun Total War" but none is as exciting as Age
of Empire or Age of Mythology.

Arigatou,

Totok Sudarijanto
http://www.samurai.or.id
email: totoks@...

"Civilize the mind but make savage the body." - Chairman Mao

Join our Chat Room here:
http://www.samurai.or.id/php/modules.php?name=IRC_Chat

messages.subject: RE: [samuraihistory] Re: Samurai war
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks. Totok Sudarijanto http://www.samurai.or.id email: totoks@samurai.or.id
messages.messageBody:
Thanks.

Totok Sudarijanto
http://www.samurai.or.id
